email / invite / body:
Hello %name%,

Someone just created an account for you on %domain%.

To activate the account and choose a password please click on the following link:
%invitation_link%

Your new account won't be activated until you click the link above.

If you're not able to click the link above, copy it and paste it into your web browser. If you have trouble with this please FORWARD this email to %support_email% and state that you had problems activating your account.

Best regards,
The Datawrapper Team
email / team-invite / body:

You have been invited to the Datawrapper team %team_name% by %invited_by%.

To accept the invitation, please visit the following website:

%invite_link%

Best regards,
Datawrapper
email / activation / body:
Hello %name%,

Thank you for signing up at Datawrapper on %domain%!

Please click on the following link to activate your email address.
%activation_link%

You're account won't be activated until you click the link above.

If you're not able to click the link above, copy it and paste it into your web browser. If you have trouble with this please FORWARD this email to %support_email% and state that you had problems activating your account.

Best regards,
The Datawrapper Team
email / change-email / subject: Datawrapper: You requested a change of your email address
email / change-email / body:
Hello %name%,

You have recently asked for a change of your email address for your Datawrapper account from %old_email% to %new_email%.

To complete this change you need to click on the following link:
%email_change_token_link%

You're email address won't be changed until you click the link above.

If you're not able to click the link above, copy it and paste it into your web browser. If you have trouble with this please FORWARD this email to %support_email% and state that you had problems changing your email address.

Best regards,
The Datawrapper Team

Please ignore this email if you received it by accident.

Please do not share this email. The activation link is secret.
email / password-reset / subject: Datawrapper: You requested a reset of your password
email / password-reset / body:
Hello %name%,

Someone, probably you, filed a request to reset your password.

If that's true, please click the following link to reset your password.

%password_reset_link%

If you ignore this email, your password stays the same as before.

Best,
Datawrapper
